report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Make/Model]

**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Inspection Location:** [Insert Location]

---

**Summary:**
The front end of the vehicle has sustained significant damage to the headlight assembly. The left headlight is completely shattered, with the outer cover and internal components visibly broken and scattered. The right headlight appears to have been impacted as well, though it is less severely damaged compared to the left.

**Details:**
- **Left Headlight:** The entire headlight assembly is shattered, with the outer cover and internal components (including the bulb and wiring) visibly broken and scattered.
- **Right Headlight:** The outer cover of the right headlight is cracked and partially detached. The internal components appear to be intact but may require inspection for any potential damage.
- **Surrounding Area:** The bumper and fender area around the headlight assembly show signs of impact, with dents and scratches visible. The paint on these areas is chipped and damaged.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has suffered significant damage to the front end, specifically to the headlight assemblies. The extent of the damage requires further assessment by a repair professional to determine the necessary repairs and estimate the cost of the repairs.

---

**Prepared By:** [Your Name]  
**Insurance Adjuster**  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Attachments:**  
- Photographs of the damage (not included in text).
